name: What the Hell is this Crown ? - Team 26
name_original: What the Hell is this Crown ? - Team 26
description:
When a cursed crown hungry for power takes over a messy battlefield, everything becomes less chaotic ... or at least should be...

To find a worthy heir, you will have to be tricky to control your army!

What the hell is this crown? is a game produced in 3 days and a half during the Godfather-Godmother Game Jam 2021 and made by 9 IIM students, from different classes.

In local 1 VS 1 , you will have to manage a completely chaotic battlefield! Each player will have to control a mysterious crown which can take possession of your bone-lazy king or your stubborn dummies who may move as they want!

Use strategy by throwing your crown to the king or the units to vary the effects and then defeat your opponent’s king or army. But be careful not to get your crown stolen along the way or it's over!


• A chaotic local multiplayer game for a lot of fun with your friends

• A balance between strategy and dynamism accessible to all

• Optimized controls for controller

• Discover a  cute fantasy world made in Pixel-Art

• Have fun on short games for a significant replayability

• Enjoy 3 entertaining and challenging maps

To be the king of the world, defeat all enemy’s dummies or slay the opposing king! In order to conquer, there is nothing better than a wonderful - but incredibly bad - army :

- The Cursed Crown   -

It’s hungry for power!

Control its trajectory by throwing it from head-to-head.

In order to do it, use the right joystick to set the trajectory/power of your throw, then press the right trigger to launch it.

- The king -

Who would have thought that a king could be this useless? Fortunately, the cursed crown -not so cursed at this point -  makes him a completely different man.

In fact, when the crown is placed on the king's head, all dummies follow his direction during a specific timelapse.

In order to do it, use the directional arrows on your controller to rule them and make them go left, right, up or down.

-The dummies -

At first cute-looking but absolutely excitable! Fortunately, once again, the cursed crown has the ability to create good soldiers out of them but... Well, this point is up to you...

 A battle starts when at least one of your dummies enter at least one of the opposing dummies' range. The numerical majority wins the fight. If there is a dummy duel (1vs1) and none of them are joined by another dummy after a certain time, the winner is randomly selected!

 When the crown is placed on the head of a dummy, it can release a battlecry that groups all nearby dummies - allies and enemies - towards it. In order to do it, move your dummy with the left joystick  and release your battlecry with the B or ◯ button!
